articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns of dangers as he quits Google
articles.description: Geoffrey Hinton tells the BBC some of the dangers in the artificial intelligence field "are quite scary".
articles.content:
A man widely seen as the godfather of artificial intelligence (AI) has quit his job, warning about the growing dangers from developments in the field.

articles.author: Chris Calcino
articles.title: Cairns artist David Hudson recalls Island of Dr Moreau experience with Marlon Brando and Val Kilmer
articles.description: David Hudson has led an extraordinary life, but his stint as a half-human, half-bison hybrid alongside the Godfather star and Val Kilmer while filming The Island of Dr Moreau remains his strangest claim to fame.

articles.author: Per Anders Johansen
articles.title: Europa åpnet grensene i juni. Nye tall forteller hvor mange som ble smittet.
articles.description: Noen dager før regjeringen skal bestemme hvilke land nordmenn karantenefritt kan reise til i sommer, ligger en rekke land godt an. Åpning av grensene i Europa i juni har gitt «ubetydelig» importsmitte, ifølge det europeiske smittevernbyrået.
